DOC.brief_summary: This study assess whether a small-group seminar intervention to prevent weight gain is effective in a general university student population, and to address the relative role of biological vs. lifestyle factors in predicting weight gain in humans.
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of Weight Gain in University Students
DOC.criteria: First year students at the Universit√© de Sherbrooke. Presence of diseases or medications that would be expected to affect weight (cystic fibrosis, diabetes, inflammatory bowel diseases, anorexia nervosa, bulimia, etc.). Pregnancy or planning a pregnancy in the next two years. Unable to give an informed consent.
